g100m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE($COLUMN{total_amount},0) > 100000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

g50m_le100m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE($COLUMN{total_amount},0) > 50000000 AND COALESCE($COLUMN{maximum_contract_amount},0) <= 100000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

g25m_le50m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE($COLUMN{total_amount},0) > 25000000 AND COALESCE($COLUMN{maximum_contract_amount},0) <= 50000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

g10m_le25m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE($COLUMN{total_amount},0) > 10000000 AND COALESCE($COLUMN{maximum_contract_amount},0) <= 25000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

ge1m_le10m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE($COLUMN{total_amount},0) >= 1000000 AND COALESCE($COLUMN{maximum_contract_amount},0) <= 10000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

less1m_count.function: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE($COLUMN{total_amount},0) < 1000000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
